statements: SELECT * FROM stem_cells WHERE donor_id = 101;
SELECT sample_type, donor_id FROM stem_cells WHERE sample_type = 'Skin';
SELECT sample_id, usage_status FROM stem_cells WHERE collection_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT sample_id, sample_type, collection_date FROM stem_cells WHERE donor_id = 202 AND sample_type = 'Blood';
SELECT * FROM stem_cells ORDER BY collection_date DESC, sample_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM stem_cells WHERE donor_id = 100 ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT sample_id, sample_type, usage_status FROM stem_cells WHERE usage_status IN ('available', 'reserved') ORDER BY sample_id;
SELECT DISTINCT donor_id, sample_type FROM stem_cells WHERE collection_date >= '2022-01-01' AND collection_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT sample_id, donor_id, usage_status FROM stem_cells WHERE sample_type = 'embryonic' AND donor_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM stem_cells WHERE sample_type != 'adult' AND (usage_status = 'reserved' OR usage_status = 'in use') ORDER BY sample_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT id, item_name, location FROM inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY expiration_date;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10 AND location = 'Storage Room';
SELECT item_name, quantity, location FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC, location;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, location, quantity FROM inventory WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT id, item_name, location FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 5 AND location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT * FROM stem_cell_samples WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sample_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, sample_id, storage_location FROM stem_cell_samples WHERE is_healthy = TRUE AND storage_location IN ('Freezer A', 'Freezer B') ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT sample_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT sample_name, storage_location FROM inventory ORDER BY storage_location DESC;
SELECT * FROM sample_usage WHERE purpose = 'Research' ORDER BY usage_date ASC;
SELECT technician_name, specialization FROM lab_technicians WHERE specialization = 'Chemistry';
SELECT sample_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY sample_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE storage_location = 'Lab A' ORDER BY sample_id DESC;
SELECT i.sample_name, i.quantity, s.usage_date FROM inventory i INNER JOIN sample_usage s ON i.sample_id = s.sample_id WHERE s.quantity_used > 5;
SELECT technician_name, specialization FROM lab_technicians WHERE technician_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY specialization ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT storage_location FROM inventory ORDER BY storage_location ASC;
SELECT * FROM stem_cell_samples;
SELECT sample_id, sample_type, quantity FROM stem_cell_samples WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM stem_cell_samples ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT sample_type, storage_location FROM stem_cell_samples WHERE storage_location = 'Freezer 1';
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users WHERE role = 'Researcher';
SELECT * FROM stem_cell_samples;
SELECT sample_id, sample_type, quantity FROM stem_cell_samples WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT u.name, u.role, s.sample_type, s.storage_location FROM users u JOIN stem_cell_samples s ON u.user_id = s.sample_id;
SELECT s.sample_id, s.sample_type, s.storage_location, l.capacity FROM stem_cell_samples s JOIN storage_locations l ON s.storage_location = l.location_name;
SELECT * FROM stem_cells;
SELECT name, location FROM stem_cells WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM usage_records ORDER BY used_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM inventory_logs WHERE action_type = 'INSERT' ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM stem_cells ORDER BY name ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT name, location, quantity FROM stem_cells WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT l.lab_name, l.location, i.action_type, i.log_date FROM laboratories l JOIN inventory_logs i ON l.lab_id = i.stem_cell_id;
SELECT u.name, u.email, COUNT(ur.record_id) AS total_records FROM users u LEFT JOIN usage_records ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id GROUP BY u.name, u.email;

SELECT s.name, u.name AS user_name, u.purpose, ur.used_date FROM stem_cells s JOIN usage_records ur ON s.id = ur.stem_cell_id JOIN users u ON ur.user_id = u.user_id WHERE ur.used_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY ur.used_date DESC;
